movies.title: Knives Out
movies.plot: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 45 wins & 93 nominations.

events.title: Harlan Thrombey's toxicology report is written

news of Marta Cabrera's inheritance gets out
